p: The particle morphology of the BBP samples which dried in incubator at 60â„ƒ were evaluated by a field emission scanning electron microscopy of Pamukkale University Electron Microscopy Unit (FESEM-Carl Zeiss, Supra 40 VP, Germany) at an accelerating voltage of 15 kV. The powders were attached to FESEM stubs using double adhesive tape, coated with gold under vacuum.
